title: 820-3332 boot stuck no progress bar
message: This is a non-liquid-spill board. I resoldered U8900. No change. It just goes to the Apple screen and hangs there with the progress bar. PRAM reset. No change. Any ideas where to go next?

title: 820-3332 boot stuck no progress bar
message: BIOS chip fucked with? Can it  boot EFI ASD?

title: 820-3332 boot stuck no progress bar
message: No, no repairs done to the board. It's untouched. It does boot to EFI ASD and passes with no errors.

title: 820-3332 boot stuck no progress bar
message: First resolder U8900 as should be done on all these boards. After that it is probably a GPU/VRAM issue.

title: 820-3332 boot stuck no progress bar
message: I resoldered U8900 and then heated it to make sure the connection were all good before starting this post. It didn't change anything. Have you seen any cases where replacing U8900 has helped?

title: 820-3332 boot stuck no progress bar
message: No, you have a GPU/VRAM issue most likely and usually that happens when someone fucked with the board.
